bib.title: GED: the method for group evolution discovery in social networks
bib.author: Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Saganowski, Stanis{\l}aw and Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw
bib.abstract: The continuous interest in the social network area contributes to the fast development of this field. The new possibilities of obtaining and storing data facilitate deeper analysis of the entire network, extracted social groups and single individuals as well. One of the most interesting research topic is the dynamics of social groups which means analysis of group evolution over time. Having appropriate knowledge and methods for dynamic analysis, one may attempt to predict the future of the group, and then manage it properly in order to
